text: Rite unlocked: Secretariat for Trade Equity! \\n A lack of regulation has caused several merchants to ignore vital trade laws and edicts. The Secretariat for Trade Equity could enforce some more stricter policies to tackle this.
Rite unlocked: Van Reeveldt's Boatbuilders! \\n The finest boatbuilders of the Wasteland are at your disposal to finish a prototype landship that can't be matched in both beauty and robustness

Rite unlocked: Breaching the Vloedmuur! \\n The Wasteland, situated several meters below sea level, can be flooded to by breaching a few dams. This will stop enemies advancing on the proud city of Marienburg.
Rite unlocked: Schemes of the Directorate! \\n Plot from the backrooms of Goudberg to weaken rival provincies, or bribe elector counts to wage useless wars against one another.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed a faction leader, dragging him to wage a war on their behalf.
The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have breached the Vloedmuur, flooding all lands belonging to Marienburg.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed the secretariat for Trade Equity, stealing profits made on river- and land trade via the enforcement of complex taxes.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed the dockyards of Marienburg, ensuring their naval power outmatches it's equals.

With a majority of the directors either bribed, intimidated or persuaded to join the Van de Kuyper's conglomerate\\nthere's nobody that stands in the way of the rule over the city-state of Marienburg. From now on, every tax, law or executive decision is made by a Van de Kuypers. Jaan van de Kuypers is truly the informal ruler of a the proud trade-city.
You have established a Criminal Network in #(settlement.region_and_province)!
